QuizML.name: Python Quiz
QuizML.Description: This is a sample quiz on the basics of python. There are some sample questions and such, but nothing too difficult.

Question.QuestionText: Which operator has higher precedence in the following list
Can we use the “else” block for for loop?
Every time when we modify the string, Python Always create a new String and assign a new string to that variable.
Which of the following is an invalid python datatype?
